verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O Messenger of Allah.
Peace be upon you, O Prophet of Allah.

verses.text: ٱلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا أَمِيرَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ سَيِّدَ ٱلْوَصِيِّينَ
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O Commander of the Faithful, the leader of the successors.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya Amir al-Mu'mineen Sayid al-Waseen

verses.text: ٱلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا فَاطِمَةَ ٱلزَّهْرَاء سَيِّدَةَ نِسَاءِ ٱلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O Fatimah al-Zahra, the leader of the women of the worlds.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya Fatimatuz Zahra Sayyidat Nisa'il Alameen

verses.text: ٱلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا خَدِيجَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَى أُمَّ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O Khadijah al-Kubra, the mother of the believers.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya Khadijat al-Kubra Umm al-Mu'mineen

verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O Hasan al-Mujtaba.

verses.text: ٱلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا أَبَا عَبْدِ ٱللَّٰه ٱلْحُسَيْنِ وَعَلَى ٱلْأَرْوَاحِ ٱلَّتِي حَلَّتْ بِفِنَائِكَ
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O Aba Abdillah al-Husayn, and upon the souls that stayed in your courtyard.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya Aba Abdillah al-Husayn wa 'ala al-arwah alati hallat bifina'ik

verses.text: عَلَيْكُمْ مِنِّي جَمِيعًا سَلَامُ ٱللَّٰهِ أَبَدًا مَا بَقِيتُ وَبَقِيَ ٱللَّيْلُ وَٱلنَّهَارُ وَلَا جَعَلَهُ ٱللَّٰهُ آخِرَ ٱلْعَهْدِ مِنِّي لِزِيَارَتِكُمْ
verses.translation: Peace be upon you from me forever, as long as I remain and as long as there are night and day. And may Allah not make it the last covenant from me to visit you.
verses.transliteration: 'Alaykum minni jamee'an salamu Allahi abadan ma baqeetu wa baqiya allayl wa annahar wa la ja'alahu Allahu akhira al-'ahdi minni li ziyaratikum.

verses.translation: Peace be upon al-Husayn,
And upon Ali ibn al-Husayn,
And upon the children of al-Husayn,
And upon the companions of al-Husayn.

verses.text: وَعَلَىٰ أَخِيكَ ٱلْعَبَّاسِ، بَابَ ٱلْحَوَائِجِ مُخْتَارِ زَيْنَبَ وَأُمِّ كُلْثُومٍ وَبِنْتِكَ سَكِينَةَ
verses.translation: And upon your brother al-Abbas, the door of needs, the supporter of Zaynab and Umm Kulthum, and your daughter Sakina.
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ala Akhik al-Abbas, Bab al-Hawa'ij Mukhtar Zainab wa Umm Kulthum wa Bintika Sakina

verses.text: ٱلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ جَمِيعًا شُهَدَاءَ كَرْبَلَاءَ وَرَحْمَةُ ٱللَّٰهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ
verses.translation: Peace be upon you all, O martyrs of Karbala, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alaykum jami'an shuhada Karbala wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh

verses.text: ٱلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا تِسْعَةَ ٱلْمَعْصُومِينَ مِنْ ذُرِّيَّةِ ٱلْحُسَيْنِ
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O nine Imams from the progeny of al-Husayn,
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya tis'at al-ma'sumeen min dhurriyat al-Husayn

verses.translation: Ali ibn al-Husayn Zain al-Abidin,
And Muhammad ibn Ali al-Baqir,
And Ja'far ibn Muhammad al-Sadiq,
And Musa ibn Ja'far al-Kazim,
And Ali ibn Musa al-Ridha,
And Muhammad ibn Ali al-Jawad,
And Ali ibn Muhammad al-Hadi,
And Hasan ibn Ali al-Askari.

verses.text: ٱلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا مَوْلَايَ يَا صَاحِبَ ٱلْعَصْرِ وَٱلزَّمَانِ
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O my master, O the Master of the Age and Time,
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya Mawla ya Sahib al-Asr wa al-Zaman

verses.text: سَيِّدِي ٱلْأَمَانَ ٱلْأَمَانَ ٱلْأَمَانَ مِنْ فِتْنَةِ ٱلزَّمَانِ
verses.translation: My leader, safety, safety, safety from the trials of time.
verses.transliteration: Sayyidi al-amana al-amana al-amana min fitnat al-zaman

verses.text: ٱلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا إِمَامَ ٱلْإِنْسِ وَٱلْجَانِ
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O Imam of men and jinn.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya Imam al insi waljaan

verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O companion of the Qur'an.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya sharik al Qur'an

verses.text: ٱلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا حُجَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي أَرْضِهِ
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O proof of Allah on His earth.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya Hujjat Allah fi ardihee

verses.text: عَجَّلَ ٱللَّهُ فَرَجَكَ وَسَهَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مَخْرَجَكَ وَظُهُورَكَ
verses.translation: May Allah hasten your reappearance and make easy your emergence and your appearance.
verses.transliteration: Ajjal Allahu farajak wa sahhal Allahu makhrajaka wa dhuhurak

verses.translation: And the mercy of Allah and His blessings.

verses.text: اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا حُجَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي أَرْضِهِ
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O argument of Allah in His lands!
verses.transliteration: alssalamu `alayka ya hujjata allahi fi ardihi

verses.text: اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا عَيْنَ ٱللَّهِ فِي خَلْقِهِ
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O sight of Allah on His creatures!
Peace be upon you, O light of Allah
by which those who have been guided [to the true guidance] are guided
and by which the believers are relieved!
Peace be upon you, O polite and fearful!
Peace be upon you, O sincere patron!
Peace be upon you, O ark of salvation!
Peace be upon you, O essence of life!
Peace be upon you.
May Allah send blessings to you
and upon your Household,
the pure and immaculate.
Peace be upon you.
May Allah hasten that which He has promised you;
namely, victory and prevalence of your authority.
Peace be upon you, O my master.
I am a servant of you
and I recognize the first and the last of your affair.

verses.text: أَتَقَرَّبُ إِلَىٰ ٱللَّهِ تَعَالَىٰ بِكَ وَبِآلِ بَيْتِكَ
verses.translation: I seek nearness to Allah, the Exalted, through your Household and you
verses.transliteration: ataqarrabu ila allahi ta`ala bika wa bi-ali baytika

verses.text: وَأَنْتَظِرُ ظُهُورَكَ وَظُهُورَ ٱلْحَقِّ عَلَىٰ يَدَيْكَ
verses.translation: and I am expecting your advent and the prevalence of the truth at your hands.
verses.transliteration: wa antaziru zuhuraka wa zuhura alhaqqi `ala yadayka

verses.text: وَأَسْأَلُ ٱللَّهَ أَنْ يُصَلِّيَ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
verses.translation: And I beseech Allah to send blessings to Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad,
verses.transliteration: wa as'alu allaha an yusalliya `ala muhammadin wa ali muhammadin

verses.translation: and to include me with those who are expecting you,
verses.transliteration: wa an yaj`alani mina almuntazirina laka

verses.translation: those who follow you and support you against your enemies,

verses.text: وَٱلْمُسْتَشْهَدِينَ بَيْنَ يَدَيْكَ فِي جُمْلَةِ أَوْلِيَائِكَ
verses.translation: and those who will be martyred in front of you in the group of your loyalists.
verses.transliteration: walmustash-hadina bayna yadayka fi jumlati awliya'ika

verses.translation: O my master, O Patron of the Age!
May Allah’s blessings be upon you
and upon your Household.
Today is Friday,
which is your day on which your advent is expected
verses.transliteration: wa huwa yawmuka almutawaqqa`u fihi zuhuruka

verses.translation: to bring about relief to the believers at your hands,
and killing of the disbelievers with your sword.

verses.text: وَأَنَا يَا مَوْلاَيَ فِيهِ ضَيْفُكَ وَجَارُكَ
verses.translation: On this day, O my master, I am your guest and in your vicinity
verses.transliteration: wa ana ya mawlaya fihi dayfuka wa jaruka

verses.text: وَأَنْتَ يَا مَوْلاَيَ كَرِيمٌ مِنْ أَوْلاَدِ ٱلْكِرَامِ
verses.translation: and you, my master, are generous and the descendant of the generous people,
verses.transliteration: wa anta ya mawlaya karimun min awladi alkirami

verses.translation: and you are commanded to receive your guests and neighbors hospitably;
so, receive me as your guest and neighbor.
May Allah’s blessings be upon you
and upon your Household, the immaculate.
